title: Skin: its structure and function
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Bruce D. Hoffman
brief_description: Examines the structural components of skin and describes its principle functions, providing examples of well known applications of skin structures and function, and micrographs of cell structure. Introduces some of the problems of skin and the basic elements of skin care.
creator_credit_for_label: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Bruce D. Hoffman
